title: disabel blind pick norms
body: So, as Oce has no draft pick, why not give us teambuilder instead of the stupid norms, it ridiculous how stupid it is that people have to call their roles on average internet for one, but even just people locking in not saying anything is stupid. just give us back team builder and remove blind pick, make life easier for everyone.

replies.body:
I like the idea of dynamic queue norms. But I don't think we should disable blind pick. Not everyone would like/want/use dynamic norms.

As the Taco girl says; "why don't we have both"
But this is gonna be like rank queue, the waiting time will be extended since mid/top/jg/adc are such high demanding roles (maybe support but people like to play champs to kill and carry)
I'd rather that than blind pick to be honest. i play pretty much nothing but ranked on my main because its easier to deal with than norms.
Yes axe the blind pick and replace with the dynamic queue please.
